author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-5289 Unable to boot 10.5.1.1 database - fails during soft/hard upgrade process for a new version number while trying to drop jdbc metadata

For 10.7 the fix for this issue is the relevant part of the  DERBY-3870 fix contributed by Knut and separated out by Mamta.  The test fix for DERBY-5105 contributed by Knut and the testcase based on the script contributed by Brett Mason.
